title: Top Places to visit in Palasa Kasibugga, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Palasa is a town in Srikakulam district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the Mandal headquarters of Palasa Mandal. It is located near to the National Highway 5 between Srikakulam and Berhampur. Along with its twin town Kasibugga

 

Geography

Palace is located at 18.46N 84.25E. It has an average elevation of 38 meters (127 feet). The town has an area of 42.75 km2 (16.51 sq mi).

 

Demographics

As of 2011 census of India, Palasa had a population of 57,507 with 25,000 households. (The total population constitute, 45,500 males and 30,000 females —a sex ratio of 1044 females per 1000 males.)?? 5,609 children are in the age group of 0–6 years, of which 2,887 are boys and 2,722 are girls —a ratio of 943 girls per 1000 boys. The average literacy rate stands at 75.68% with 39,276 literates, significantly higher than the state average of 67.41%.

 

Government and politics

Main article: Palasa-Kasibugga Municipality

Palasa Municipality is a civic body constituted in the year 2000. It is spread over an area of 32.75 km2 (12.64 sq mi) with 23 wards. Palasa (Assembly constituency) in Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly.in Palasa (Assembly constituency) Palasa, Mandasa and Vajrapu Kotturu mandals come under this jurisdiction.

 

Economy

There are more than 350 cashew processing industries around Palasa, the highest amongst the northern coastal districts. These twin cities are the largest cashew producing towns of Andhra Pradesh and are among the largest processing centers in India. The cashew industry provides direct and indirect employment to about 15,000 people in the surrounding areas.

 

Healthcare

The Community Health Centre, Andhra Pradesh Vaidya Vidhana Parishad is located here. It can hold 50 inpatients.

 

Transport

Roadways

National Highway 16, a part of the Golden Quadrilateral highway network, bypasses the town. A flyover was constructed in 2016 for the convenience of people across the railway track.

 

Education

The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government, aided and private schools, under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools is English, Telugu.

 

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Palasa

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Satrampadu, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content:
Satrampadu is a census town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in the Eluru Mandal of the Eluru revenue division. The town is a constituent of Eluru urban agglomeration.

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Salur, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content:
Salur or Saluru is a municipal town and Mandal headquarters in Vizianagaram district, of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.
